    name        = "my-rbac-policy"
    namespace   = "my-namespace"

      action     = "allow"
      api_groups = ["app.f5.com"]

# f5distributedcloud_rbac_policy (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_rbac_policy` resource manages RBAC Policies in F5 Distributed Cloud.

RBAC Policies define role-based access control rules that determine what actions users and services can perform on specific resources.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_rbac_policy" "example" {
  name        = "my-rbac-policy"
  namespace   = "my-namespace"
  description = "RBAC policy for application access"

  rules {
    action     = "allow"
    api_groups = ["app.f5.com"]
    resources  = ["virtual_hosts", "origin_pools"]
    verbs      = ["get", "list", "create", "update", "delete"]
  }
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `rules` (Block List) List of RBAC rules defining access permissions. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--rules))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--rules"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rules`

Required:

- `action` (String) The action to take (allow or deny).

Optional:

- `api_groups` (List of String) List of API groups this rule applies to.
- `resources` (List of String) List of resources this rule applies to.
- `verbs` (List of String) List of verbs (actions) allowed on the resources.
